text: @Femi_Sorry @MoS_Politics @MailOnline @DailyMailUK Also, the Daily Excrement seems to forget that @BorisJohnson bragged about shaking hands with everybody in a hospital with Covid-19 patients and hasn’t been practising social distancing.
